text: Jacqueline Vaudecrane (22 November 1913 â€“ 27 February 2018) was a French figure skater. She was born in Paris. She finished first at the French Figure Skating Championships in 1937 and 1938.VIDEO, ina.fr; accessed 15 April 2017 Vaudecrane became a successful coach. Vaudecrane died in Paris on 27 February 2018 at the age of 104. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jean-Christophe Berlot, The mother of French skating celebrates her 100th birthday , icenetwork.com; 18 November 2013 Category:1913 births Category:2018 deaths Category:French centenarians Category:Figure skaters Category:Sportspeople from Paris
title: Jacqueline Vaudecrane
